ModMetaData.name: More Catgirl Genes
ModMetaData.author: bblkepling
ModMetaData.description: More catgirl genes, because why not. Includes 4 basic xml genes(Cat Voice, Happy Camper, Kibble Eater, and Nuzzler) for vanilla Biotech, and 3 c# genes(Wild Shitter, Litter Trained, and Tongue Cleaning) with Dubs Bad Hygene installed.
